index.name: java
index.subtitle: Java
index.about: Java is the foundation for virtually every type of networked application and is the global standard for developing and delivering embedded applications, games, Web content, and enterprise software. With more than 9 million developers worldwide, Java enables you to efficiently develop and deploy exciting applications and services.

videos.title: Introduction OOP
videos.description: Let's learn the OOP (Object Oriented Programming) basic using Java.

videos.title: Object Introduction
videos.description: In this episode you will learn the basics about Java objects.

videos.title: Class
videos.description: In this video let's learn about how to build classes.

videos.title: Class attributes
videos.description: A short video about attribute classes for beginners.

videos.title: Functions and Methods
videos.description: A good video about how to handle with functions and methods.

videos.title: Parameters and arguments
videos.description: This is the second video about functions and methods, now explaining what are parameters and arguments.

videos.title: Instances
videos.description: In this video you will learn how to initialize a class creating an object's instance.

videos.description: A good video which explains how to overloading methods.
